attributes.action: consider using pay as you drive insurance schemes for car tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a norwich union insurance pay as you drive tracking device in my vehicle as I do very little mileage. I get a detailed statement of my vehicles activity every month, why should I pay full car tax if I can prove I only do 3000 miles per year !!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
